Package helper.dbaccess.dao

Class DBCustomer

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.dbaccess.dao.DBCustomer
  • public abstract class DBCustomer
extends java.lang.Object
    The DAO object/class that is used to perform all database operations pertaining to the Customer model.
    See Also:
    Customer

      • createCustomer

        public static java.util.Optional<Customer> createCustomer​(Customer customer)
        Creates a customer record in the database given a customer model.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer with the fields populated.
        Returns:
        a new Customer model that has the latest after the creation.

      • updateCustomer

        public static boolean updateCustomer​(Customer customer)
        Updates a customer record in the database given a customer model.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer with the fields populated.
        Returns:
        true if the customer was updated, false if there was an issue.

      • deleteCustomerFromId

        public static boolean deleteCustomerFromId​(int customerId)
        Deletes a customer record from the database given a customer id.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the customer id.
        Returns:
        true if the customer was deleted, false if there was an issue.

        Returns:
        the customer.

      • buildCustomer

        private static Customer buildCustomer​(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given a result set that is in the middle of being used, build a customer with the current row.
        Parameters:
        rs - the ResultSet.
        Returns:
        the new Customer model object.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if extracting fields fails.
